Name: IIS Website - Set IP Security
Description: Takes a list of ip/mask and allow them in ipsecurity
Author: BlackstarSolar

Parameters.Name: IpAddresses
Parameters.Label: List of ip addresses
Parameters.HelpText: A newline separated list of IP addresses and/or IP address and subnet mask pairs in the format <IPAddress>/<SubnetMask>.

Parameters.Name: EnableProxyMode
Parameters.Label: Enable proxy mode
Parameters.HelpText: If the website is running behind a proxy, this setting most likely need to be checked.

Parameters.Name: SetDeny
Parameters.Label: Set deny
Parameters.HelpText: If checked, IIS will be changed to "Deny" all IP addresses not added to the list.
